languages.text: {n}Монтэг прищуривается, вглядываясь вам в лицо, а затем с облегчением тянет:{/n} "Все-таки брешут. Не похожи вы на бедонос{mf|ца|ицу}".
{n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг прищуривается, вглядываясь вам в лицо, а затем с облегчением тянет:{/n} "Все-таки брешут. Не похожи вы на бедонос{mf|ца|ицу}".

{n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."

languages.text: {n}Er studiert mit gerunzelter Stirn dein Gesicht, ehe er sichtlich erleichtert verkündet: {/n} "Das sind alles nur Geschichten. Ihr seht für mich nicht wie {mf|ein Bote|eine Botin} des Leids aus."
languages.original_text: {n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er studiert mit gerunzelter Stirn dein Gesicht, ehe er sichtlich erleichtert verkündet: {/n} "Das sind alles nur Geschichten. Ihr seht für mich nicht wie {mf|ein Bote|eine Botin} des Leids aus."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux plissés, il étudie votre visage avant de reprendre la parole d'un air visiblement soulagé :{/n} « Bah, ce ne sont jamais que des contes à dormir debout. En ce qui me concerne, vous n'avez pas le profil d'un oiseau de malheur. »
languages.original_text: {n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux plissés, il étudie votre visage avant de reprendre la parole d'un air visiblement soulagé :{/n} « Bah, ce ne sont jamais que des contes à dormir debout. En ce qui me concerne, vous n'avez pas le profil d'un oiseau de malheur. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich examina tu rostro con los ojos entrecerrados y luego añade con visible alivio:{/n} «De todos modos no son más que habladurías. A mí desde luego no me parece {mf|un portador|una portadora} de desgracias».
languages.original_text: {n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich examina tu rostro con los ojos entrecerrados y luego añade con visible alivio:{/n} «De todos modos no son más que habladurías. A mí desde luego no me parece {mf|un portador|una portadora} de desgracias».

languages.text: {n}彼は目を細め、あなたの顔を観察する。そして明らかに安堵した様子で言った。{/n}「結局のところはただの物語ですよ。あなたは苦難をもたらす者のようには見えません」
languages.original_text: {n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は目を細め、あなたの顔を観察する。そして明らかに安堵した様子で言った。{/n}「結局のところはただの物語ですよ。あなたは苦難をもたらす者のようには見えません」

languages.text: {n}他眯起眼睛，仔细端详着你的脸，之后以明显宽慰的语气开了口。{/n}“看来那些话不过是谣言。在我看来，您根本不是什么不祥之人。”
languages.original_text: {n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}他眯起眼睛，仔细端详着你的脸，之后以明显宽慰的语气开了口。{/n}“看来那些话不过是谣言。在我看来，您根本不是什么不祥之人。”

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kısıyor, yüzünü inceliyor, ardından gözle görülür bir rahatlamayla konuşuyor.{/n} "Hepsi yalnızca birer masal sonuçta. Hiç uğursuzluk getiren birine benzemiyorsunuz bence."
languages.original_text: {n}He narrows his eyes, studying your face, then says with visible relief,{/n} "It's only tales after all. You just don't look like a bringer of woes to me."
